original_text: When he did come out, he tried to talk to them. But he could not speak. So they knew that God had showed him something special in the room. He was moving his head and his hands about, to tell them what had happened. But still he could not speak.
korean_text: 그가 나와서 그들에게 말을 못하니 백성들이 그가 성전 안에서 환상을 본 줄 알았더라 그가 몸짓으로 뜻을 표시하며 그냥 말 못하는 대로 있더니

sentences.original_text: he tried to talk to them
that God had showed him something special
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그에게 특별한 것을 보여주셨다는 것을

sentences.original_text: He was moving his head and his hands about
to tell them what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 무슨 일이 있었는지 그들에게 알려주려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: But still he could not speak
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여전히 그는 말을 할 수 없었습니다
